arts.ttl: Drama aplenty as 10-man Mainz hold Freiburg in thrilling 2-2 draw
arts.sum: Despite the setback, Mainz held firm, with goalkeeper Robin Zentner producing a stunning save to deny Vincenzo Grifo's free-kick just before half-time. Goals from Jonathan Burkardt and Andreas Hanche-Olsen had the home side pushing for victory, but Michael Gregoritsch and Lukas Kübler had other ideas for the visitors.
With Mainz celebrating their 120th birthday, fellow European hopefuls Freiburg were on hand to spoil the party as they played out a 2-2 draw.

arts.ttl: Bo Henriksen praises all four of Mainz’s German call-ups: “Recognition for the whole team.”
arts.sum: FSV Mainz 05 trainer Bo Henriksen took time to congratulate his two freshly nominated German national team players at his Friday press conference.

arts.ttl: Mainz 05 vs. Freiburg preview: Crucial clash in battle for Champions League qualification
arts.sum: Two teams vying for Champions League qualification will face off when Mainz welcome Freiburg to the Mewa Arena for Saturday’s Bundesliga clash.

arts.ttl: How are Mainz and Freiburg pushing for UEFA Champions League qualification?
arts.sum: Both sides pride themselves on a solid defensive foundation, but Mainz can boast the second-best defensive record in the league, having conceded just 26 goals; a club record at this stage after 25 matchdays. Historically, no team has ever made it into the top four by the end of the season with more goals conceded than goals scored - the best final position ever achieved by a side with a negative goal difference was fifth place, which has been done by only three teams in top flight history: Borussia Dortmund (1970, -7), Hamburg (1971, -9) and most recently Kaiserslautern (2000, -5).

arts.ttl: Preview: Mainz 05 vs. Freiburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Mainz 05 and Freiburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Lothar Matthäus on Bayern Munich's European dreams, 'surprise package' Mainz and Borussia Dortmund's inconsistencies
arts.sum: The legendary Bayern Munich and Germany midfielder talks to bundesliga.com about his former club's European aims, why Mainz are this season's breath of fresh air and discusses Borussia Dortmund's hot-and-cold campaign. They’re on the right path, with an eight-point lead over Leverkusen in the Bundesliga and they’re in with a chance to reach the Champions League final in Munich on 31 May, which would, of course, be a home game – an additional incentive to get there.

arts.ttl: Merlin Röhl to miss clash against Mainz
arts.sum: After already missing the game against Leipzig, Freiburg's Merlin Röhl will also miss the Bundesliga matchup against Mainz 05 on Saturday.
